Description: Lunaphore brings a new way of utilizing standard, non-conjugated antibodies to perform high-plex immunofluorescence assays, empowering researchers with a slide-in, data-out approach. Here, we present COMET™: our innovative, high-throughput solution that enables single-cell analysis of up to 40 biomarkers on the same slide. Attendees will also discover how Lunaphore’s sequential immunofluorescence (seqIF) approach can streamline protocol design, optimization, and execution, allowing researchers to move faster in deciphering the immune microenvironment.
SearchResultBody: ESP18. Lunaphore Technologies: Streamline Your High-Throughput, High-Plex Immunofluorescence Assays
Title: Lunaphore Technologies: Streamline Your High-Throughput, High-Plex Immunofluorescence Assays
